title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated stale issue/PR workflows to run weekly instead of daily/hourly, with adjusted schedules (e.g., Mondays for no-response checks).
Increased inactivity thresholds (e.g., 21 days for no-response issues/PRs) and added clearer labeling/messaging.
Added reporting flags (`staled-issues-prs`, `closed-issues-prs`) for workflow transparency.
Split `triage-stale-check.yml` into two focused jobs: one for inactive items and one for pending reviews.
Modified nonprofit discount details to include 25% off Enterprise Cloud and updated URL.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated stale issue/PR workflows to run weekly instead of daily/hourly, with adjusted schedules (e.g., Mondays for no-response checks).
- Increased inactivity thresholds (e.g., 21 days for no-response issues/PRs) and added clearer labeling/messaging.
- Added reporting flags (`staled-issues-prs`, `closed-issues-prs`) for workflow transparency.
- Split `triage-stale-check.yml` into two focused jobs: one for inactive items and one for pending reviews.
- Modified nonprofit discount details to include 25% off Enterprise Cloud and updated URL.
